attributes.action: Halt plans for a centralised National Identity Register.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned believe that we have the fundamental right to own our personal data without yielding control to government or any other body. Furthermore, we believe that the stated objectives of the National Identity Register can be met through a decentralised system where we control how our data is used and by whom.

We believe that the current plans are flawed and represent a loss of civil liberties, and as such should be halted.
